name: Talk Knight
_source: s;SoldierBlue;You must be the one Titus told us about.
s;Simon;We'd really appreciate your help in Vesner's tomb.
s;SoldierBlue;Those bandits really did a number on our troops.
s;SoldierBlue;And monsters have been attacking our convoy at night.
s;SoldierBlue;We've lost some good men and women the past few days.
s;Simon;Why not retreat and bolster your forces?
s;SoldierBlue;Courage has really died out nowadays.
s;SoldierBlue;Look, kid, this is a medal from one of our soldiers who died in a bandit attack two days ago.
s;SoldierBlue;Think retreat ever crossed his mind?
s;SoldierBlue;I ask that you take this and think on the meaning of courage before we proceed.
